text: 59|6|Avarkalitamiruntu, allah tan tutarukku (ciramam etuminri)k kotutta porulkalukkaka (nampikkaiyalarkale!) Ninkal kutiraiyin miteriyo, ottakattin miteriyo (por purintu) ciramappatavillai. Eninum, allah tan natiyavarkalin mitu tan tutarkalukku atikkattaik kotuppan. Allah cakalavarrin mitum perarral utaiyavan avan
